com.mapquest.android.maps
Class MapActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.mapquest.android.maps.MapActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public abstract class MapActivity
extends android.app.Activity

This is the foundation class for displaying a map in your application. You will need to subclass this in order to instantiate a MapView which handles the management of maps in an application. This class will handle the life cycle management of the MapView. You can have more than one MapView in your application just keep in mind you will also have more overhead needed in order to maintain the map.
